abstract: Alibaba.com, the business-to-business unit of China’s Alibaba Group, received approval from the Hong Kong stock exchange to list up to $1 billion worth of shares, Dow Jones reported.
lead_paragraph: Alibaba.com, the business-to-business unit of China’s Alibaba Group, received approval from the Hong Kong stock exchange to list up to $1 billion worth of shares, Dow Jones reported.

headline.main: Alibaba.com Said to Eye $1 Billion Hong Kong I.P.O.
